message: Let's be fair, Bob. This offer benefits us both.
Alice, my turn. I understand you value fairness, but time is money! Let's settle this now before inflation eats away at your share.
Bob, let's be reasonable.  My offer is still the most fair considering the inflation. We both lose if this drags on.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  I'm offering a fair 50/50 split.  Take it before inflation makes it even worse for you!
